LanguageData.LessonPositive.stages.0.label: Learned something new
LanguageData.LessonPositive.stages.0.description: I attended a good lesson today.
LanguageData.LessonNegative.stages.0.label: Bad lesson
LanguageData.LessonNegative.stages.0.description: I didn't like today's lesson for some reason.
LanguageData.TaughtCL.stages.0.label: Taught others
LanguageData.TaughtCL.stages.0.description: It's nice to teach something to other people.
LanguageData.AttendedElection.stages.0.label: Attended election
LanguageData.AttendedElection.stages.0.description: I attended the election we held. I hope we voted right.
LanguageData.LeaderUnliked.stages.0.label: Unliked
LanguageData.LeaderUnliked.stages.1.label: Hated
LanguageData.NewRuler.stages.0.label: Crowned
LanguageData.NewRuler.stages.0.description: I was born for this, ruling is my destiny!
LanguageData.BadRuler.stages.0.label: Bad ruler
LanguageData.BadRuler.stages.0.description: I'm supposed to trust them to rule us?
LanguageData.CrownedRulerJealous.stages.0.label: Jealous of new ruler
LanguageData.CrownedRulerJealous.stages.0.description: I know I could do better...
LanguageData.ElectedLeader.stages.0.label: Elected
LanguageData.ElectedLeader.stages.0.description: The colony voted for me to be a leader. I'm honored!
LanguageData.ElectedLeaderJealous.stages.0.label: Jealous of new leader
LanguageData.ElectedLeaderJealous.stages.0.descriptio: I wanted to be the new leader. It's not fair.
LanguageData.LeaderEnd.stages.0.label: Leadership ended
LanguageData.LeaderEnd.stages.0.description: I'll miss the benefits of being a leader.
LanguageData.LeaderArrested.stages.0.label: Leadership ended by force
LanguageData.LeaderArrested.stages.0.description: Who do they think they are? This is an outrage!
LanguageData.LeaderArrestedColonist.stages.0.label: Leader arrested
LanguageData.LeaderArrestedColonist.stages.0.descript: Thankfully the leader everyone hated was stopped.
LanguageData.RivalLeader.stages.0.label: Rival elected
LanguageData.RivalLeader.stages.0.description: My rival is now a leader. Great.
LanguageData.InspiratedL.stages.0.label: Inspired by leader {0}
LanguageData.InspiratedL.stages.0.description: A leader shared some words of inspiration with me. I feel motivated.
LanguageData.InspiratedLI.stages.0.label: Inspired {0}
LanguageData.InspiratedLI.stages.0.description: It's always nice to inspire someone else.
LanguageData.LeaderDied.stages.0.label: Leader {0} died
LanguageData.LeaderDied.stages.0.description: Such a good leader. Will be missed.
LanguageData.LeaderDiedRival.stages.0.label: Leader {0} died (rival)
LanguageData.LeaderDiedRival.stages.0.description: It's about time we got rid of this one.
